pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Enables creative flight while the totem is active.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/totem_of_amethyst)Totem of Amethyst$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 1$(br)$(l)Active/Passive:$() Active, drains durability while using$(br)$(l)Tier:$() Extreme$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Other active totem augments.
